opt_prism

PURPOSE

OPT_LENS - Spherical lens single glass.

SYNOPSIS

function [opt] = opt_prism(opt_type,opt_spec)

DESCRIPTION 

 OPT_LENS - Spherical lens single glass.
 OPT_TYPE should be 'prism' (hm good and vital argument), OPT_SPEC
 should be a string matrix, see README_OPT for specification.
   Necessary specification fields: 
 r1, r2, normal1, normal2, dxdydx, glass
 glass should be name of the glass type, the other 1x3 array
   Optional specification fields:
 arc, arc1 arc2
 example OPT_SPEC:
 'normal1     1 0 0'
 'normal2     cos(30*pi/180) sin(30*pi/180) 0'
 'r1          12 0 0'
 'r2          12.5 0 0'
 'dxdydz1     0 1.5 1.5'
 'dxdydz2     0 1.7321 1.5'
 'glass       bk7'
 'arc         .5'
 
 Calling:
 [opt] = opt_prism(opt_type,opt_spec)

 See also OPT_APERTURE, OPT_GRID, OPT_LENS, OPT_SCREEN, OPT_SLIT

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • opt_elem OPT_ELEM - Default opt_elem structure
  • opt_findstr OPT_FINDSTR - find string S in character array H,
  • opt_prism OPT_LENS - Spherical lens single glass.
This function is called by:
  • opt_build OPT_BUILD - Builds optical system specified in FILE
  • opt_prism OPT_LENS - Spherical lens single glass.

0029 if nargin ~= 2,
0030   help opt_prism;
0031   ok = 0;
0032   return;
0033 end;

0035   
0036 opt1 = opt_elem(opt_type);
0037 opt2 = opt_elem(opt_type);
0038 
0039 % defaults
0040 opt2.glass = 'air'; % going out into air after the prism
0041 opt1.r(2:3) = 0; % Prism centered on the optical axis
0042 opt1.n = [1 0 0]; % Prism perpendicular to the optical axis
0043 opt2.r(2:3) = 0; % Prism centered on the optical axis
0044 opt2.n = [1 0 0]; % Prism perpendicular to the optical axis
0045 opt1.arc = 0; % no anti reflection coating
0046 opt2.arc = 0; % no anti reflection coating
0047 
0048 % set the necessary ones:
0049 % prism size
0050 ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'dydz1');
0051 opt1.dxdydz = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0052 ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'dydz2');
0053 opt2.dxdydz = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0054 % prism position
0055 ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'r1');
0056 opt1.r = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0057 ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'r2');
0058 opt2.r = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0059 % prism normal1
0060 ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'normal1');
0061 opt1.n = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0062 % prism normal2
0063 ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'normal2');
0064 opt2.n = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0065 % prism glass
0066 ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'glass');
0067 opt1.glass = strtok(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0068 
0069 % set the optional ones
0070 ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'arc');
0071 if length(ii) == 1
0072   
0073   opt1.arc = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0074   opt2.arc = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0075   
0076 elseif length(ii)>1
0077   
0078   ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'arc1');
0079   opt1.arc = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0080   ii = opt_findstr(opt_spec,'arc2');
0081   opt2.arc = str2num(opt_spec(ii,12:end));
0082   
0083 end
